## MERN Movie App - Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements (COMPLETE - MERN stack movie app with auth, admin features, and movie browsing)
- [x] Scaffold the Project (COMPLETE - Full backend and frontend structure created)
- [x] Customize the Project (COMPLETE - All features implemented)
- [x] Install Required Extensions (Not needed - No specific VS Code extensions required)
- [ ] Compile the Project (PENDING - Requires Node.js installation and npm)
- [ ] Create and Run Task (PENDING - After npm installation)
- [ ] Launch the Project (PENDING - After installation)
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete (COMPLETE - Comprehensive documentation provided)

### Project Status: READY FOR SETUP

All project files have been created and are ready for installation. The user needs to:
1. Install Node.js and npm
2. Run `npm install` in both `server/` and `client/` directories
3. Configure `.env` file in server directory
4. Start both backend and frontend servers

### Files Created
- Backend: 6 controllers, 3 models, 3 routes, 1 middleware, 1 main server file
- Frontend: 3 pages with CSS, 1 navigation component, 1 context provider, 1 API service
- Documentation: README, INSTALLATION, QUICK_START, API_DOCUMENTATION, TROUBLESHOOTING, PROJECT_SUMMARY
- Setup scripts: setup.bat for Windows, setup.sh for Unix/Mac

### Next Steps for User
1. Install Node.js v14+ from https://nodejs.org/
2. Install MongoDB (local or Atlas)
3. Run setup.bat (Windows) or setup.sh (Unix/Mac)
4. Configure .env file with MongoDB URI
5. Follow QUICK_START.md for running the application
